name.baseName: equipment installation and withdrawal ; coal mining
设备安装与回撤;开采煤炭

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The equipment installation and withdrawal process described pertains to a coal mining operation. The data set is relevant for understanding the logistical and temporal aspects of handling mining equipment in large-scale coal extraction. Specifically, it can apply to scenarios where year-round production schedules and equipment management are crucial in industrial mining activities.
设备安装与回撤过程涉及煤炭开采作业。此数据集对于理解大规模煤炭提取中处理采矿设备的逻辑和时间方面具有相关性。具体而言，它可以适用于一年四季的生产时间表和设备管理在工业采矿活动中至关重要的场景。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The annual output of M coal mine is 1.2 million tons, and the actual working time is 360 days per year, so the working face needs 499 days to complete the mining. In the mining process of a working face in M coal mine, the time of installation and withdrawal of equipment is half a month respectively. In one year of production, the time of excavation is 11 months, and the time of mining is 10 months.
M 煤矿的年产量为120万t，每年实际工作时间按360d计，则该工作面共需 499d开采完成。M煤矿一个工作面的开采过程中，设备的安装与撤回的时间各为半个月，在一年的生产中，掘进的时间为11个月，回采的时间为10个月。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The equipment installation and withdrawal process described pertains to a coal mining operation. The data set is relevant for understanding the logistical and temporal aspects of handling mining equipment in large-scale coal extraction. Specifically, it can apply to scenarios where year-round production schedules and equipment management are crucial in industrial mining activities.
设备安装与回撤过程涉及煤炭开采作业。此数据集对于理解大规模煤炭提取中处理采矿设备的逻辑和时间方面具有相关性。具体而言，它可以适用于一年四季的生产时间表和设备管理在工业采矿活动中至关重要的场景。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Data set users should account for the time allocation of equipment installation and withdrawal when modelling the lifecycle of the coal mining process. Notably, the time dedicated to equipment setup and retraction must be included in the overall process time for accuracy. Users should also note that the equipment is inactive for one month per year due to these processes. It is advised to ensure the operational timeline reflects reality and that the assumptions about equipment utility time are consistent with this data's representation.
数据集使用者在对煤炭开采过程的生命周期进行建模时，应考虑设备安装和回撤的时间分配。值得注意的是，为了确保准确性，必须要将设备设置和收回所需的时间包括在整个过程时间内。用户还应注意由于这些过程，设备每年有一个月的时间是不活动的。建议确保操作时间表反映实际情况，并且设备使用时间的假设与此数据的表示一致。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Based on the time schedule of each stage in the full life cycle of coal mining in M ​​Coal Mine and the mining time of the entire working face, the power consumption of equipment installation and withdrawal during the full life cycle of mining in this working face was calculated.
根据M煤矿煤炭开采全生命周期内各个阶段的时间进度安排以及整个工作面的开采时间,计算得出这一工作面开采的全生命周期中设备安装与回撤的电力消耗量。

Based on the time schedule of each stage in the life cycle of coal mining in M ​​Coal Mine and the mining time of the entire working face, it is calculated that the power consumption of equipment installation and withdrawal during the entire life cycle of mining in this working face is 14413.87 mw·h. of CO2 emissions.
根据M煤矿煤炭开采全生 命周期内各个阶段的时间进度安排以及整个工作面的开采时间,计算得出这一工作面开采的全生命周期中设备安装与回撤中消耗14413.87mw·h的电量产生的CO2排放量。
